name: Big Bang
description: Big Bang sprang into existence when Green House Seeds combined Skunk, Northern Lights, and El Niño into one indica that packs the power of the cosmos. Sweet apple with accents of rose and violet bring a rich aromatic experience to this 80% indica, whose sedating effects run most popularly with patients treating pain and sleeplessness. Relief expands and spreads throughout the body, calming stress both physical and mental. Big Bang bursts into flowering, finishing in 8 to 9 weeks indoors or around the end of September in outdoor grows.
descriptionPlain: Big Bang sprang into existence when Green House Seeds combined Skunk, Northern Lights, and El Niño into one indica that packs the power of the cosmos. Sweet apple with accents of rose and violet bring a rich aromatic experience to this 80% indica, whose sedating effects run most popularly with patients treating pain and sleeplessness. Relief expands and spreads throughout the body, calming stress both physical and mental. Big Bang bursts into flowering, finishing in 8 to 9 weeks indoors or around the end of September in outdoor grows.

highlightedReviews.text: One of my favorite smelling and tasting buds. Very fruity smell like peaches and apples, accompanied by flowers like fresh blossoms with undertones of skunk. Starts in the head smoothly taking control of the mind relieving anxiety and stress and replacing it with happiness and euphoria. Turns into a full body buzz that warms the body and kills all my pain (irritable bowel disease). The relaxation effect Big Bang gives is very pleasant and can easily rock you into a deep sleep if smoked too much. I have found no negative effects from this strain other than trying to contain its stank that reeks up a room very fast :D
Great strain, nice sweet taste. very relaxing and euphoric. Awesome in the evening

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Big Bang, Frisian Dew, Green Poison, Jamaican Lion, and Purple Gorilla
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Ask and you shall receive, good people of Leafly. Elected by you, this week's new strains include Big Bang, Frisian Dew, Green Poison, Jamaican Lion, and Purple Gorilla. Read more about each variety below, and if you've come across any of these newcomers in your own strain hunting, enlighten us with a strain review. Keep the tips coming!
   1. Big Bang
Characteristics of Big Bang:

80% indica
Cross between Skunk, Northern Lights, and El Niño
Breeder: Green House Seeds
Apple, rose, and violet aroma
Possesses sedating, calming, and stress-relieving qualities
May help with pain, sleeplessness, and anxiety
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   2. Frisian Dew
Characteristics of Frisian Dew:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Super Skunk and Purple Star
Breeder: Dutch Passion
Spicy, pine, and citrus aroma
Delivers powerfully euphoric effects and full-body relaxation
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   3. Green Poison
Characteristics of Green Poison:

70% indica
Breeder: Sweet Seeds
Fruity, floral aroma
Brings body numbness and cerebral euphoria
May help with pain, insomnia, muscle spasms, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 7 weeks

   4. Jamaican Lion
Characteristics of Jamaican Lion:

High-CBD sativa strain
Breeder: Shadrock
Sweet herbal aroma
Delivers mildly psychoactive effects as well as elevated sensory perception, focus, and creativity
May help with pain, anxiety, and inflammation
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   5. Purple Gorilla
Characteristics of Purple Gorilla:

60% indica-dominant hybrid
Grape, cherry, and citrus aroma
Has relaxing, "couch-lock" effects
May help with pain, insomnia, migraines, and muscles spasms
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks
